newsitem.title: ESTONIA: TALINVEST SAYS LEKS ISSUE PRICE NOT SETTLED.
newsitem.headline: TALINVEST SAYS LEKS ISSUE PRICE NOT SETTLED.

text.p: Investment bank Talinvest on Thursday said that the issue price for Leks Insurance company has not yet been set although Leks chairman Raul Kastan earlier told Reuters that the issue price would be 1.9 kroons nominal.
Rain Nuka, corporate finance official at Talinvest, handling the Leks issue, confirmed the share issue would be worth four million kroons.
He said that 1.9 million kroons of shares would be sold to the public.
"Agreement has not been reached on the issue price," Nuka said.
He also said that commercial bank Tallinna Pank would take up its pre-emptive rights for 2.1 million kroons of shares.
